A Better Way to learn algorithms

Platform offers a structured and guided path, breaking down challenging concepts into manageable steps, to enhance your skills and solve complex problems efficiently.

  • Strings
  • Arrays
  • Linked List
  • Stacks & Queues
  • Graphs

  • Sorting

1. Conceptual Overview

We begin with a conceptual approach to problem-solving, followed by an in-depth exploration of the fundamental principles of data structure and algorithms techniques.

2. Big O Notation Analysis

Understanding how much memory an algorithm uses and how fast it runs is crucial for providing an efficient solution, this involves analyzing the algorithm's space-time complexity.

3. Code Implementation

Walkthrough of the code implementation of the algorithm . We provide Solutions with the best time and space complexity analysis to ensure optimal performance and efficiency.

A development platform

A development platform that offers a fast and flexible development experience, making it easier to solve complex problems efficiently.

Environment that gives the best development experience.

Cutting-edge coding platform with advanced features, offering syntax highlighting, prettier formatting, and customizable text settings for an unparalleled development journey enhancing productivity and refining your craft effortlessly.

Whether you're a novice or an experienced developer our platforms covers from the basics of programming to advanced data structures and algorithms, enhancing your coding skills, logical thinking, and algorithmic efficiency.

solution/mostFrequentChar.js 

export function tokenTransform(s, tokens) {
   let output = [];
   let i = 0;
   let j = 1;
   while (i < s.length) {
      if (s[i] !== '$') {
         output.push(s[i]);
         i += 1;
         j = i + 1;
      } else if (s[j] !== '$') {
         j += 1;
      } else {
         const key = s.slice(i, j + 1);
         const value = tokens[key];
         const evaluatedValue = tokenTransform();
         tokens[key] = evaluatedValue;
         output.push(evaluatedValue);
         i = j + 1;
         j = i + 1;
      }
   }
   return output.join('');
};

export function tokenTransform(s, tokens) {
   let output = [];
   let i = 0;
   let j = 1;
   while (i < s.length) {
      if (s[i] !== '$') {
         output.push(s[i]);
         i += 1;
         j = i + 1;
      } else if (s[j] !== '$') {
         j += 1;
      } else {
         const key = s.slice(i, j + 1);
         const value = tokens[key];
         const evaluatedValue = tokenTransform();
         tokens[key] = evaluatedValue;
         output.push(evaluatedValue);
         i = j + 1;
         j = i + 1;
      }
   }
   return output.join('');
};

solution/mostFrequentChar.js 

export function tokenTransform(s, tokens) {
   let output = [];
   let i = 0;
   let j = 1;
   while (i < s.length) {
      if (s[i] !== '$') {
         output.push(s[i]);
         i += 1;
         j = i + 1;
      } else if (s[j] !== '$') {
         j += 1;
      } else {
         const key = s.slice(i, j + 1);
         const value = tokens[key];
         const evaluatedValue = tokenTransform();
         tokens[key] = evaluatedValue;
         output.push(evaluatedValue);
         i = j + 1;
         j = i + 1;
      }
   }
   return output.join('');
};

Are there any prerequisites to using this platform?

You should already have a foundational understanding of programming concepts (such as conditional statements, loops, and basic string manipulation) and feel confident writing simple code snippets. This platform is designed to help you advance your skills, not to teach you the basics of coding.
